entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Generators for different roslyn versions need different strong names #101750
  • Can't trace all GC allocations with ETW #101748
  • P99 Latency for .net 8 services increased > 10x #101746
  • Obsoletions with a DiagnosticId still get warnings in generated code #101738
    9.0.0
  • [Mono][Wasm][Interp] Assertion fail in Marshal.GetFunctionPointerForDelegate #101736
  • ILLink analyzer doesn't warn for unknown interpolated string #101733
    9.0.0
  • Test failure in System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.SingleGenericTensorPrimitives.SpanDestinationFunctions_SpecialValues #101731
    9.0.0
  • `System.IO.DirectoryInfo` misreports the `Extension` property for instances constructed with a trailing path (directory) separator #101730
  • .NET 9: Unhandled exceptions in background threads reported with empty managed frames #101729
  • NativeAOT + classlib + macOS host + linux-bionic-arm64 target: doesn't work out of the box / inscrutable errors #101727
  • System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.SingleGenericTensorPrimitives.SpanScalarDestination_SpecialValues fails #101721
  • dotnet restore fails when building repo #101720
  • Update `ConfigureHttpClientDefaults` to provide `IHttpClientBuilder` with the actual `Name` of an `HttpClient` #101719
  • Double check failing `allocPgoInstrumentationBySchema` EE calls #101711
    9.0.0
  • [9.0.100-preview.5.24227.1] IPInterfaceProperties.GatewayAddresses Property returns NULL #101710
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 20 Regressions on 4/28/2024 2:54:10 PM #101728
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 1 Regression on 4/22/2024 7:01:47 PM #101723
  • superpmi tool crashing with "Heap contamination detected!" #101708
    9.0.0
  • Why is `biarch` image used for Arm64 glibc and not Alpine? #101707
  • [API Proposal]: Add `FillAsync` and `FillSchemaAsync` to `DataAdapter` #101704

Closed

  • Assertion failed: (GetComponentSize() <= 2) || IsArray() #86273
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: readytorun/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism.cmd #101060
    9.0.0
  • [libraries-pgo] segfault in System.Linq.Tests #98292
    9.0.0
  • Dataflow analysis models result of `newobj` as MultiValueLattice.Top #101102
    9.0.0
  • May 9 21:11:41 server883 kernel: [218937.760135] .NET Server GC[1427719]: segfault at 8 ip 00007f7440ae835c sp 00007f74395bfdf0 error 6 #86183
    Future
  • Trim/AOT analyzer missing some ILC warnings #101203
    9.0.0
  • segv in JIT when ingesting dotnet/runtime into dotnet/aspnetcore #101695
    9.0.0
  • ConfigurationBinder source generator generates non-compilable code with new property changing enum types #101273
    9.0.0
  • AbbreviatedMonthGenitiveNames_Get_ReturnsExpected_HybridGlobalization failing with string mismatch #101634
    9.0.0
  • HttpClientHandler with PreAuthenticate enabled can't refresh expired password #93340
    9.0.0
  • superpmi replay/diff osx/arm64 failing #101685
    9.0.0
  • How to Apply XML Configuration for Removing Specific Attribute Instances in .NET Linker ( NativeAOT ) #101680
  • Assert failure: !"Heap contamination detected! HeapFree was called on a heap other than the one that memory was allocated from.\n" #55517
    6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • unblock Unix Domain Socket on Dispose on macOS #101753
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • Track unknown value as result of unimplemented operations #101752
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix CodeQL issue cpp/enum-index in mono #101751
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Remove Thread::m_pDomain - always the one app domain #101749
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix some TensorPrimitives tests failing for me locally with checked builds #101745
    needs-area-label
  • [Testing] Backport #92375 and #93082 to release/8.0-staging #101744
    new-api-needs-documentation, needs-area-label
  • Arm64/Sve: Add SignExtendWidening* and ZeroExtendWidening* math APIs #101743
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-arm64-sve
  • Exclude dependabot from community-contribution labeling #101742
    area-Meta
  • Use classes rather than records for parts of the incremental pipeline in interop generators and hide constructors #101740
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • JIT: synthesize PGO if no schema, when dynamic PGO is active #101739
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging]: Add cryptographic operation counts to prevent process crashes #101737
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 8.0.x
  • Run MethodOutParameterDataFlow tests in analyzer #101735
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [NO MERGE] generic wrapper methods for unsafe accessors #101732
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [WinHttpHandler] Move `_cachedSendPinnedBuffer` ownership to `WinHttpRequestState` #101725
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Update patch after template change #101712
    area-Build-mono
  • Update CentOS Stream version #101705
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Testing] Backport #92901 to release/8.0-staging #101703
    area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [PERF] Temporarily use specific dotnet-version #101747
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0-staging] Prefer most derived member in Configuration Binder source generator #101686
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.x
  • Fix nonvolatile context restoration #101709
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Preserve static type info for return value of ctor #101212
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/9.0-preview4] JIT: Avoid relying on `bbNum` to find lexical loop boundaries #101724
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix #91958: use mach_timebase_info to determine process time coefficient on macOS #100122
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-mac-os-x, 8.0.x
  • JIT: Avoid relying on `bbNum` to find lexical loop boundaries #101714
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Backport #92296 to release/8.0-staging #101627
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Enable repackaging of NETStandard 2.1 Targeting Pack #101518
    Servicing-approved, area-Setup, 8.0.6
  • [release/8.0-staging] Revert "FileConfigurationProvider.Dispose should dispose FileProvider when it owns it" #101610
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-FileSystem
  • [LoongArch64] clear float type when passed by integer reg. #101713
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [S390x] Fix stack offset size while passing structure as argument. #101103
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • With system brotli, do not use versioned symbols #101576
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Backport assorted changes from runtimelab #101655
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Switch off `HybridGlobalization` lane on v8 on CI #101671
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Refresh cached credentials after PreAuthenticate fails #101053
    area-System.Net.Http
  • SPMI: Replay recorded allocPgoInstrumentationBySchema HRESULT #101696
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Extend mono_gsharedvt_constrained_call for static virtual calls #101491
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.x
  • [mono] Force Mono to respect explicit struct size when LayoutKind.Sequential is used #101529
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Update build instructions table #101706
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Arm64/Sve: Add SignExtend* and ZeroExtend* math APIs #101702
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-arm64-sve
  • Optimize flips between 1 and 0 #100491
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Remove distros versions calculation #100580
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution

Updated

  • Refactor some DateTime and TimeSpan formatting/parsing methods #101640
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • Seal overridden virtual method `SetDefaultFallbacks` #100030
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Remove perfinfo-%pid.map #101697
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add support for primary constructors in LoggerMessageGenerator #101660
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Merge JIT/Methodical tests into the merged runners #101317
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add `hostfxr_resolve_frameworks_for_runtime_config` for resolving runtime frameworks #101451
    area-Host, 9.0.0
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add AddAcross #101674
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Linker dependency framework #101277
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    area-Build-mono
  • Add more complete linux build instructions #101631
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][interp] Resolve virtual method on delegates created by compiled code #101290
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [NOREVIEW][NOMERGE] HTTP/3 stress data corruption hunt #101624
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • Enable derived COM interfaces to hide base methods with the new keyword #101577
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Clean up in LowerStoreIndirCoalescing #101665
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Code Versioning - move native code versioning state #101652
    area-VM-coreclr, Future
  • Remove unnecessary indirect use of managed wcslen from AppContext setup #101318
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Replace NETCOREAPP compiler directive with NET #101693
    area-Meta
  • add hooks to debug OpenSSL memory #101626
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Use source built emsdk packages for the runtime build #100266
    area-Build-mono
  • Haiku: Add Haiku support for CoreCLR/PAL #93907
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • [release/8.0-staging] Revert "disable optimizations for PopCount (#99796)" #101245
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • JIT: Implement greedy RPO-based block layout #101473
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix unnecessary bounds check with ulong index #101352
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add option to change SVE vector length for current and children processes #101295
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • ARM64: Optimize Volatile.Read/Write for floats #101359
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix generic runtime lookup expansion in Tier0 #101153
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Test Only] async safe point interrupts after NOP change #101151
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • Remove received bytes length check #100619
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • Disable OpenSSL internal SSL_SESSION cache for clients #101684
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [RISC-V] Add quirks for riscv to R2RDump #101683
    area-R2RDump-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Use ``BitOperations`` in couple more places #101701
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Simplify "secret stub arg" handling between JIT and EE #100823
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][wasm] Refactor mono_fixup_symbol_name #101681
    arch-wasm, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Fix 97272 #99818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 124.0.6367.91, windows: 124.0.6367.91 #101653
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Try to reduce cost of Async #101605
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • [browser] Fix ConvertDllsToWebCil stack dump on bad input to be error message with input path #101162
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Implement ARM32 atomic intrinsics #97792
    arch-arm32, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • optimize the store/restore for calleeSavedRegs. #101472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-30
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable linux build #2569

Updated

    area-SwiftBindings

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [WebDeploy] WDP fails to sync when package comes from a DevDrive #40562
  • Not able to install MAUI on ArchLinux system #40576
  • Security risk in Docker image: CVE-2023-45853, CVE-2023-50387, CVE-2024-0553 #40558
  • Error text is the wrong color when stdout is redirected #40547

Closed

  • I was struggling with omnisharp not resolving the dotnet-sdk snap on 20.04 until I discovered that a simple #40068
  • [NETSDKE2E][Regression]With 6.0.422 SDK installed, .Net Host will stop working when creating F# mvc/webapi project. #40503

PullRequests

Created

  • Temporarily disable the publish of the installer manifest #40580
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Have --no-restore imply -restore:false to override any response file command-line arguments #40579
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Add test #40548
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix and update vmr-sync scripts #40583
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add nativeToolsOnMachine flag #40572
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Mention package references from dotnet list help at the top level #40317
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Reduced frequency of GitHub stale action; add action write permissions #40533
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Clean up PR artifacts publishing #40486
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Source-build fixes and clean-up #40559
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Don't fail log publishing when test results folder doesn't exist #40557
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove duplicated Version file entries #40546
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow

Updated

  • Aspire #40111
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Semantic search should check project's type #73284
  • Consider improving langversion diagnostics for "unsafe in iterators" feature #73280
  • Build fails on .NET 7 #73279

Closed

  • [VB] Remove redundant `Call` #71818
    Backlog
  • ForAttributeWithMetadataName in IIncrementalGenerator never runs comparisons on output values #66324
    17.6
  • `KeyNotFoundException` during compilation of `goto` that leaves lambda #73068
    17.11
  • Unexpected ```IInvalidOperation``` for ref returning property as a target of member initializer #72916
    17.11

PullRequests

Created

  • Update msbuild version to 17.3.4 #73283
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Handle ref safety analysis for type parameters with 'allows ref struct' constraint #73281
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Document breaking change: Collection expression for type implementing `IEnumerable` must have elements implicitly convertible to `object` #73278
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix sorting of extensions from more specific to less #73276
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles

Merged

  • Load projects referenced through ProjectReference with ReferenceOutputAssembly=false to MSBuildWorkspace #73285
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix failures in C# LSP inline completion (snippets) #73282
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #73277
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Specially handle more scenarios for type parameters with 'allows ref struct' constraint #73232
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Handle labels in outer scope in control flow pass #73234
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix IOperation of byref member initializer #73243
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #73275
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • On The Fly Documentation #73268
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update configs for 17.11 branch #73271
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #73286
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Partial properties: diagnostics for mismatch between parts #73250
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Partial Properties
  • Partial properties: merging declarations and emit of simple cases #72999
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Partial Properties
  • Resolve extension members in all non-invocation contexts #73239
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Move test reference assemblies forward #73266
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.11
  • Allow unsafe blocks in iterators #73046
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async
  • Require AddExplicitInterfaceImplementation for adding a type that implements member explicitly #73265
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Ensure source paths are comparable with editorconfig directory paths #73100
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Lower drop retention from 10 years to 3 months #73190
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove nonreentrantlock type #72087
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Enable Arcade V3 publishing in PR Validation #73221
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Getting random WebSocket failed connection of Blazor Server Application hosted on an Azure App Service #55442
  • FileStreamResultExecutor does not support DisposeAsync #55441
  • Run the .NET WebAssembly runtime in release mode in published Blazor apps #55438
  • Request Timeouts dynamically calculated #55437
  • Can we trust the `maxAllowedSize` of `IBrowserFile.OpenReadStream`? #55435

Closed

  • Aspire Components APIs #55031
  • Redirect On Signout without making your own Controller #55329
  • Update the qrcode docs for authenticator apps / how to generaten qrcodes for 2fa? #55260
  • CS8103: combined length of user strings used by the program exceeds allowed limit #20224

PullRequests

Created

  • Add separate activities for Hub methods #55439
    area-signalr

Merged

  • Quarantine CheckStdoutWithLargeWrites_TestSink #55432
    area-networking, 9.0-preview5
  • Update build.gradle okhttp dependency #55434
    area-signalr, community-contribution, 9.0-preview5
  • Add utf-8 BOM to sln file to force utf-8 encoding #55423
    area-mvc, 9.0-preview5
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `5a37b51` to `d83fee1` #55380
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview5
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.5.24229.2 #55416
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 9.0-preview5

Updated

  • Use built-in OpenAPI support in templates #55343
    area-mvc
  • [H/3] Fix code passed into QuicConnection.CloseAsync and QuicStream.Abort #55282
    area-networking
  • Add support for the Partitioned cookie attribute #55371
    area-networking
  • Delete flaky test MultipleThreadsForceRefresh #55290
    area-dataprotection
  • [release/8.0] Fix duplicate error.type tags in metrics #55301
    Servicing-approved, pending-ci-rerun, area-hosting, 8.0.x
  • DO NOT MERGE - install scripts check #54828
    area-infrastructure
  • Relocate webtransport streams initialisation from HTTP3 connection accept loop to streams type #55425
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Retry `Microsoft.AspNetCore.DataProtection.KeyManagement.KeyRingProviderTests.MultipleThreadsForceRefresh` #55228
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun

Issues

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [XC] Consider compiling the OnIdiomExtension into OnIdiom<T> #22142
  • The rapid response of DragGesture Recognizer. #22141
  • I have some problems with dependencies #22140
  • [android] Identified crash in toolbar extensions when using a custom image source #22138
  • Switch.Toggled Triggering & Binding Problems #22137
  • [iOS] Splash and app icon doesn't work on a real device #22136
  • Vertical Scrolling in ScrollView Orientation = "BOTH" is not working [Android] #22133
  • App crashes when navigating from TabbedPage to another TabbedPage #22131
    Backlog
  • Label text overlap in HorizontalStackLayout #22130

Closed

  • Nuget connectivity/ Android Device manager connectivity #19537
  • How to use Android's jar? And there are armeabi v7a dependencies on so files. #22129
  • Picker Crash App on iOS Simulation #21972

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] SemanticProperties.HeadingLevel not working in ListView #21830 #22135
    platform/android 🤖, area/a11y, community ✨

Updated

  • Update NavigatedFromEventArgs.cs #21754
    area/navigation 🧭, community ✨
  • [iOS] Apply contentInsets for any entry/editor in a scrollview #21807
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, layout-scrollview

    area/infrastructure 🏗️

    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Android] Flyout Page support for IconImageSource #22099
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-flyout
  • [Android] Crash removing item from CarouselView - fix #22107
    platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • Add .NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid + Web App solution template #21867
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [iOS] Shell/NavigationPage TitleView #20959
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨, control-titleview
  • [Span] Improve formatting inheritance #21191
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • [iOS] Shell page title fix #20575
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • [android] fix one layer of "overdraw" by default #22126
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️
  • Add support for running Appium tests with BrowserStack #18312
    area/testing, stale
  • Binding source generator #21725
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Windows] Fix performance issue using Shadows #18337
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Android] DatePicker Focus and Unfocus events #20547
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-datetimepicker
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Are Async Gets now the recommended standard? #33647
  • ef migrations bundle causing runtime errors since upgrade to .Net8 #33646
  • Normalize .Count != 0 to Any() in preprocessing #33644

Closed

  • OnModelCreating is called twice when adding a new migration #26186
    9.0.0
  • Wrong model creation for alternate keys using annotations and removed index #33531
    9.0.0
  • HasConversion to a nullable Type does not seem to work #33645
  • How do I debug why a performance issue occurs when it doesn't if I use the EF given query? #33638
  • Generalize the restriction on executing Include methods on query provider #33636
  • too many migrations files give compilation error and even BSOD #33641
  • Provide option to use varchar instead of nvarchar for JSON columns #33643

PullRequests

Merged

  • Only build the model once and cache the (non)runtime one in the same pass. #33642
  • Remove temporary properties created by ForeignKeyPropertyDiscoveryConvention if they aren't used. #33611

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Don't generate a discriminator in the snapshot if there's no discriminator property. #33622
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.6
  • Support hierarchical partition keys in Cosmos provider #33536
    breaking-change
  • Various code cleanup/styling for Cosmos query pipeline #33637
  • Pregenerate SQL for precompiled queries #33510
  • Use [CallerArgumentExpression] for parameterName argument in Check methods #33524

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-30
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Distribute preview releases with packages.microsoft.com #7683
  • .NET 5.0 SDK Preview 4 Installer on Windows 10 Blocked - Signed with Revoked Cert #7581
  • Deb installer dependency links are broken #7502
  • Error out properly when building WPF on ARM64 app until support is added. #7467
  • Cleanup WindowsDesktop KnownFrameworkReferences once WPF adds ARM64 support #7466
  • .gitattributes is missing "* text=auto" that ensures CRLFs aren't accidentally added #7465
  • .NET logo not aligned in Windows .NET SDK installer, vs. Runtime installers #7462
  • Installer URLs are pointing to blob storage #7460
  • Preview 3 -> System Restore -> Preview 2 is failing. #7398
  • SDK installer leaves empty directories so it appears that an older SDK is still installed #7368
  • Add better logging for test run times when a build times out #7209

Updated

  • Ordering of PlatformAssemblyPaths passed to crossgen is wrong #6877
  • Language of installer does not match display language #2453
    backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Update-mariner-tag #19617
  • Delete SourceBuiltArtifacts after bootstrap #19616
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #19615
  • [main] Update dependencies to ensure coherency #19614
